      Returns a Room based on the given name.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the Room object where the weapon is located.

      Return the secret passage room that linked with this room.
      Methods in Objects with parameters of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Set the room where the weapon is moved or swapped.
